Author: questions_anonymous
Text: Thanks for the support! Honestly, most of me is thrilled by the idea that this could trigger restriction again... I hate myself and I don't even really care about keeping my body "healthy" like this if it means feeling so fat and disgusting.

Author: Cosmicapybara
Text: I know this may be difficult to hear, but hating that your period has returned is just a signal that you’re still struggling with an ED, even if you feel discredited or invalidated by ur recent behaviours. You still deserve compassion n love n support,   I’ve been trying to recover and I got my period back just under a mont ago- right around a time where I was definitely flirting w/ restriction. It made me rlly want to relapse, but now I’m trying to meet my body in the middle, if it’s trying to return to this state, I might as well give myself a shot at nourishing it. I don’t know if this was any help but I just want to let u kno ur not alone ❤️❤️
